revised_title: Roman Altar Inscription Found Near Stanhope in Durham
tldr: The article presents an inscription found on a Roman altar near Stanhope in the Bishopric of Durham. The inscription is written in Latin and provides information about the altar's dedication to Silvano, an undefeated Roman deity. The inscription was communicated to the Royal Society by Reverend Mr. Thomas Birch.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
